name: Lunar Dance
summary: Causes the user to faint. The next Pokemon to come in will have their HP and PP resorted, as well as all status conditions removed.
viability: Cresselia's support movepool is unbelievable, and this move is certain proof of that. It can save a teammate from the brink of fainting, having a status, anything really. It can set up late game sweepers very nicely.
